name: Blueberry Muffin 4: Revival of Muffin
description:
The long-awaited sequel to the sequel to the sequel of Blueberry Muffin 1 is here. Blueberry Muffin 4 is action-packed and took me 32 hours to even come up with it. Don't believe me? Then you try making a game

Here are some words from our testers

4/10 IGN "I don't even know
10/10. "Don't." -VineDiamond
10 kromer
